entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Nanaimo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:59 AM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nanaimo Airport 12:48 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.8°C
Wind: N 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023
